entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7 except minus 12 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except minus 12 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15 except minus 20 near the Saskatchewan border.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15 except minus 20 near the Saskatchewan border. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023
